评论概述: Long sleeve off shoulder sheer soft top
评论详情: Long sleeve shirt with butterfly design. Off shoulder with small buckle to hold side shirt for a less of shoulder look. Blue is denim color without stiffness of some denim. Loose fitting with flattering waist.true to size but for tighter look going 1size smaller may work.

I'm 5'3" 115lbs no curves to speak of. By the sellers sizing, I should have bought a medium. I bought a large...it fit but was soooo tight, it was quite a chore to take it off. Too bad, it's cute. Returned.
